mapper.select: select c.communityNo as communityNo,c.userNo as userNo, c.communityTitle as communityTitle, date_format(c.communityDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as communityDate, u.username, r.replyCount from community as c join user as u join(select c.communityNo, ifnull(r.replyCount,0) as replyCount from community as c left outer join (select communityNo,count(*)as replyCount from reply group by communityNo) as r on c.communityNo = r.communityNo) as r where c.userNo = u.userNo and c.communityNo = r.communityNo order by communityNo Desc;

select c.communityNo as communityNo,c.userNo as userNo, c.communityTitle as communityTitle, date_format(c.communityDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as communityDate, u.username, r.replyCount from community as c join user as u join (select c.communityNo, ifnull(r.replyCount,0) as replyCount from community as c left outer join (select communityNo,count(*)as replyCount from reply group by communityNo) as r on c.communityNo = r.communityNo) as r where c.userNo = u.userNo and c.communityNo = r.communityNo and u.username = #{username} order by communityNo Desc;

select c.communityNo as communityNo,c.userNo as userNo, c.communityTitle as communityTitle,c.communityContent as communityContent, c.communityDate as communityDate, u.username, count.replyCount from community as c join user as u join(select count(*) as replyCount from reply where communityNo = #{communityNo}) as count on c.userNo = u.userNo where c.communityNo = #{communityNo};
mapper.update: update community set communityTitle = #{communityTitle}, communityContent = #{communityContent}, communityDate = now() where communityNo = #{communityNo};
